mean_cn: adj. 坚忍不拔的，固执的，顽强的
mean_en: that does not stop holding something or give up something easily; determined; continuing to exist, have influence, etc. for longer than you might expect
sentence: The boxer was very tenacious, and would not give up.
sentence_trans: 这个拳击手很顽强，不会认输。
word_etyma: ten握住，支撑 + acious多…的 → 拿住不放 → tenacious固执的
